# 首届云原生编程挑战赛

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shoujie-yun-yuansheng-biancheng-tiaozhansai
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shoujie-yun-yuansheng-biancheng-tiaozhansai
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shoujie-yun-yuansheng-biancheng-tiaozhansai
shoujie-yun-yuansheng-biancheng-tiaozhansai <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shoujie-yun-yuansheng-biancheng-tiaozhansai
shoujie-yun-yuansheng-biancheng-tiaozhansai <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
